about: Heya heya, this is BlackMetalGhost. No relation to the youtuber/LPer who is rubbish at old NES games. I'm a terrible Minecraft PvPer-who gets killed a lot. Probably has somthing to do with my habit of Banzai charging everything I see, be it a noob or a fully diamond armored boss. Anyway, I like anime (so cliched. I know), and am pretty geeky. Hit up EnderPearlReaper if you wanna confirm that- he's my friend.
